actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the provision which limits the deduction for percentage depletion in the case of oil and gas wells to 65 percent of taxable income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the 65 percent limitation on the deduction for percentage depletion in the case of independent oil and gas producers and royalty owners.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the provision which limits the deduction for percentage depletion in the case of oil and gas wells to 65 percent of taxable income.
